text: Lalle ne, Muna ganin jujjũyãwar fuskarka a cikin sama. To, lalle ne, Mu jũyar da kai ga Alƙibla wadda kake yardã da ita. Sai ka jũyar da fuskarka wajen Masallãci Tsararre, kuma inda duk kuka kasance, to, ku jũyar da fuskõkinku jiharsa. Kuma lalle ne waɗanda aka bai wa Littãfi, haƙĩƙa su, sunã sanin lalle ne, shĩ ne gaskiya, daga Ubangijinka. Kuma Allah bai zama Mai gafala ba daga abin da suke aikatãwa
